author: Maggie Fitzgerald
title: These stocks are the work-from-home winners and losers, according to Jefferies
description: Consumer paradigm shifts to an increase in online retail will benefit e-commerce giant Amazon and payments companies Visa and Mastercard, said Jefferies.
content:
(This story is for CNBC Pro subscribers only.)
The working from home trend due to coronavirus shutdowns will prevail after the deadly virus is contained, according to Jefferies. 
The Wall Street firm expects the benefits of remote working to cause a doublin… [+932 chars]
